page.title: 11WHITE CLEVES QUARRY
page.content: The sizes are called grades.There are six grades these are:one and a half inches,three quarters of an inch,half an inch,three eights of an inch, quarter of an inch,and dust. Nowadays they use split blasting.The digging is all done by machinery.They start blasting from{9-9:30}in the morning.Then they blast again at one o clock in the afternoon and again at 4 o clock to 5 o clock.About 30 men are employed doing various jobs including :-dumper drivers,crusher men,plant attendent,drop ball driver, coat and plant operator,lorry drivers ,shovel drivers.The sound of the explosion is muffled by the motorway bridge which is on the town side of the {quarry.}
